pages.text: Many changes are made to basic vanilla behaviours in the $(thing)Crucial 2$() modpack to make gameplay more fun. This section covers a few of the more relevant ones you may wish to know about.$(br2)Keep in mind this is not an exhaustive list, and you're bound to find more as you play!

The entries initially highlighted with exclamation marks are very important ones you should know ahead of time. Anything else, you can just come back and read up when relevant.$(br2)Make sure to check back often so you don't miss cool changes!
